title: When Banned Books Unlock the Secrets of My Universe

author: Melissa Roxburgh
content:
Every year older, every new space, and every new person required me to create new personalities that were used to protect myself. I used my achievements, my successes, and my accomplishments to fill a very large void. When things got hard, I pushed myself beyond the limit with the thought: if I am successful and thrive in my excellence, it will compensate for my gay bodyLorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.
